content: hi this cute little sea turtle is available in hebrew and english this is a cal project all parts where published the english translation is completed and available for download i m not a native speaker so i would appreciate it a lot if you let me know about grammar mistakes and typos please write me if you have any questions or want to translate it to other languages to suzi farkash@gmail com you can also contact me on facebook https //www facebook com/suziisakovart and tag me on instagram @suzi_isakov best regards suzi
